author: Source: The Times of India
title: Watch Earth as it rotates on new Nasa website - The Times of India
text:
Nasa, the US space agency will post at least a dozen new colour images of Earth acquired from 12 to 36 hours earlier by Nasa's Earth Polychromatic Imaging Camera WASHINGTON: Nasa has launched a new website where you can see images of the full, sunlit side of the Earth as it rotates every day. Once a day, the US space agency will post at least a dozen new colour images of Earth acquired from 12 to 36 hours earlier by Nasa's Earth Polychromatic Imaging Camera .
 The Times of India.
